title: Schedule a Property Showing
description: A buyer's agent requests to schedule a showing for a listed property.

tasks.description: Receive the showing request and check the property's showing availability calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies available time slots based on the seller's preferences.

tasks.description: Confirm the requested time with the seller and the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully coordinates and confirms the appointment time with all parties.

tasks.description: Provide the buyer's agent with lockbox access instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the correct and secure access information for the property.
